thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: Mary

author: Mary
title: Mary
text: I had an unexpected hiccup with a delivery of heavy floor boards. The delivery truck could not come down the driveway and so left them on the street ! I was beside myself thinking what should I do. My valuable delivery was at risk of being stolen by passers by. I had to do something asap. Airtasker came to mind and so I gave it a try. It was so easy. I posted a description of the job required and the price I wanted to pay. Almost immediately I got takers for the job. I was able to see the job seekers reviews and chose the seeker with the best review. They turned up at the promised time, they promptly did the work. I paid with credit card... So simple. So great ! Problem solved....I was able to get the job done promptly and without fuss.... I highly recommend Airtasker for anyone with a job that needs doing immediately or at a later time.
